channel.title: Help please, i play on hyperscape
channel.description:
i need help on a few things:
-Changing to Ancients -Using magic attacks -using range attacks
ty for ur time

item.title: Help please, i play on hyperscape
item.dc:creator: @_Dharok **Dharok**
item.description:
@_Dharok wrote:

[quote=“5oulmist, post:2, topic:45365”]Do you mean hybridscape?

There arent any servers that really use range that good but try something like p.16 or pimpscape to use magic attacks[/quote]

yes i did sorry

Read full topic
